You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &breve;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Breve;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/02d8/index.htm U+002D8].
  * `&breve;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/02d8/index.htm U+002D8].
